A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A true passing of the torch from the original cast to the new cast!  I loved it\, and i didn't want it to end\, even two and a half hours later as the credits rolled\, i wanted more!\n\nAs Luke interacts with Leila\, he truly stood in for ALL of us who miss Carrie Fisher. The force will be with her\, always.
